title: Web Audit
creator: University of Nebraska – Lincoln
description: Web Audit helps you maintain your site by running automatic audits that help you find and fix problems that affect user experience. Audits include accessibility via axe-core, HTML validation, link checking, security (https and mixed content), spelling, SEO, and more.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
